website_summaries.verdict: A large bookcase that can fold flat against the wall, but is rock solid when it is set up.
pros: The whole unit folds flat to fit against a wall or under a bed
Pieces lock together to form a sturdy shelf that won't wobble or collapse under weight
Spacious four-shelf unit can hold many books and knickknacks
cons: Some users have said that the assembly was more difficult than they were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Major Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: The advertising for this is VERY misleading. It does not arrive as a simple-to-set up folding bookcase. Instead, they ship you dozens of tiny little pieces that require extensive assembly. The entire point of a folding bookcase is that it ships in a compact form and all you need to do is unfold it and perhaps attach a few shelf holders. I would strongly advise against buying this. For the amount of labor required, you could just buy some dimensional lumber and make the bookcase yourself from scratch. You'd end up with better quality for less money and about the same amount of effort.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reader

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Very upset, received delivery and the product itself if very nice and very heavy, but the accessories package was not in the box!!!! No screws, no washers, no wood plugs, nothing to put the bookcase together. Now they expect me to prove proof of purchase, control number and all this to get the missing set of accessories. To try and send back, it is so heavy, I can’t lift by myself. The post office young man , sat it in the entryway for me. Poor way of doing business for a product that is actually a nice looking, well designed product, but not having the accessories package in the box is crap!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Matthews

customer_reviews.title: horror story
customer_reviews.text: the bookshelf is nice looking but being a foldable bookcase i thought it would come put together. it is a total nightmare trying to get it together. i have never had such a problem. i will have to hire some one to do it for me or return the item. the case it self is nice looking just what i wanted. next time warn a person about put together difficulties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon ad I read 3 days ago (bookcase was on sale) cited that it was fully assembled. Just arrived. It isn't assembled, not by a long shot. If I had 6 arms, it would be easier to assemble with far less expletives. A VDay gift for my wife to house her watercolor books, get them off the floor, where I tripped as though in a minefield. Thinking back to that? Preferable to the agony of assembly. I'M SUCH AN IDIOT! I see it's $103+ today, AND says assembly required. I'm 75, fit, but sick of an allen wrench ruling my life. Caveat emptor to my fellow husband compatriots!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Turano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy piece, heavier than I expected, but in a good way. Very sturdy, doesn't look like something i put together. One piece, a brace,was missing, but Winsome Wood replaced it immediately, no questions, no cost to me. Did not prevent me from assembling the shelf, I was able to add it later. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase, but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these bookcases; I've assembled one. It is a very nice bookcase, a good size for the room where I'll be putting them. It is definitely best, as the instructions indicate, to have two people to assemble. The tool provided, a small hex wrench is totally inadequate. I recommend using a ratchet wrench with a 4mm bit, and you might want to use a rubber mallet to tap in the wood plugs that cover the screws. I am quite happy with the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wagstrom

customer_reviews.title: There were stange indents
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mission design; and for me it was easy to assemble. I have other folding shelves I have had for YEARS and when I saw this I thought it would look great among the others AND it has a top shelf!! The weird thing was that it had little indents pressed up the back inside of the side pieces. You could not see them once the shelf was assembled but I am sure it had to be done prior to the packing up of this item becase they were so uniform. I still like it and will probably buy another one once I have the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The write up for this bookcase should explain that the folding bookcase does not arrive in its folded state. The entire unit has to be constructed from the ground up, and it is a time-consuming, unpleasant process. I did it myself because I had no choice, but if you do buy this bookcase, have a strong and patient coworker. It took me far over the time I would have expected to do this job. I wish I’d just gone to the furniture store and bought proper bookcases. To put this into perspective, I have assembled dozens of pieces of furniture in my life, and this was the most unnecessarily difficult piece of them all.
customer_reviews.author: Obama Fan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This item is very heavy and difficult to assemble. You really need two people, one to hold pieces together and another to crank the hex screws. There are pilot holes but it is extremely difficult to put together using only the included tools. I bought two but the second one is never going to come out of the box. Maybe I can give away the second heavy difficult monstrosity. I like the assembled shelf but not enough to go through the pain of setting up a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Signature required?
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for three days during which the status on Amazon's page is "Out for delivery". It also indicates that a "signature required"? I've had much more expensive (and compact) items delivered without a signature, last week an expensive German made pressure cooker. In this day and age who steals 'bookshelves'? Never happen, just like no one steals 'work boots'. Next time I see the "Signature Required", I ain't buying it!
customer_reviews.author: John is Gone

customer_reviews.title: Wooden dowels do not fit, screws are hard to put in with supplied tiny wrench, hard to level.
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are not worth the money. They come needing complete assembly. The Yu Shan shelves are assembled, and have better reviews so I will purchase those next time. I may need to sent this item back, as the wooden dowels are not uniform and my shelves lean a bit like the Tower of Pisa. I will have to be careful what I put on the shelves if I keep them. (I was finally able to get things level after taking the shelves apart and putting them back a second time.) The wood the product is made of looks nice, but the consumer would be better off buying shelves that come put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcase!  Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: This does need to be assembled but my "assembler" said it was very well engineered. He said there was one minor defect where the wood wanted to split but he altered something to make it work. Otherwise this is a great product and I would highly recommend. This is real wood. Very sturdy. Folds really cool. Has a top to it unlike the stacking type. It was about $30. more than the cheap ones I was looking at and I'm glad I went to this one. If your looking for a decent quality product over junk pick this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Really well made and looks good
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to find a solid wood bookcase in a Mission style that isn't either outrageously expensive or stained in a dark color. This bookcase stood out as perfect for our needs, and lived up to the appearance. Reasonably priced, solidly made, good looking in design and execution. I put it together alone. It would have helped to have another set of hands, but wasn't absolutely necessary. Good, clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Kleeman

customer_reviews.title: Love but not easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase and even ordered a second one, however, it is not easy to put together--at least not for me! My daughter ended up putting it together for me and I found that it is an absolute necessary Virtual Learning accessory for our household. It really helps with organizing my two grandsons school supplies. It is sturdy and physically attractive.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not expensive yet very sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a bookshelf next to my bed. It is hardwood, no particleboard. Made of wood pieces glued together, sanded smoothly, and finished with a clear coat. Has substantial weight to it, joined well, holds weight of hardcover books well. I am happy with it and recommend it. Not hard to assemble if you are careful. Be sure to coat all screws with wax before assembling. Do not put screws all the way in until the shelves have been inserted. When all pieces are together give all screws a final tightening. Has a nice Mission Style look to it.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Screws Not Fitted to Holes
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf looks fine but we've had to hire someone to put it together. The screws are poorly tooled and are too short and large for the holes drilled for them in the wood--consistently. The screws themselves require a hex wrench which makes going very slow. The hinges on everything (not adequately pictured on the website) pinch at every opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Gretag

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Wood & Assembly Design
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these shelves. One came with a split cross piece. Unfortunately did not notice the split until the unit was mostly assembled. You definitely need an extra pair of hands to put these together. Amazon gave me a credit to offset to take some of the sting from the damaged part.
customer_reviews.author: Sudsy

customer_reviews.title: Classy Organization
customer_reviews.text: This shelf comes as a kit that needs to be assembled. It is sturdy "real" wood (pine I think) and if assembled correctly is surprisingly stable. The shelves fold up and the whole thing packs away for easy storage. It was smaller than I thought it'd be but not because of any deceptive advertising, I just had more books to shelve than the two I bought could accomodate. Definitely good for guest rooms or a quick way to organize your stuff for surprise guests. The price was perfect and it was fun to build. I'm probably going to buy some more of these as they actually do look pretty classy, though simple, all assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shelve, Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The shelve came in very well packaged. Instructions were easy to follow and only took about 15 minutes to put together. I wish the shelve was a bit deeper, but I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adelman

customer_reviews.title: Post office won't deliver this!
customer_reviews.text: The bookcase itself is excellent--sturdy, attractive. Just what I wanted. I ordered it delivered because joint pain makes it difficult for me to manage heavy items on my own. But evidently, the US post office no longer allows carriers to make 3-point turns or go in reverse--so the carrier won't come up my long driveway to make a delivery. I had to go the post office to pick this up. I won't be able to order large, heavy items from Amazon anymore. There are a lot of driveways like mine in the US. I wonder if Amazon is aware that their deliveries aren't going to get to customers?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! Quality materials, and easy assembly. All the "holes" are well drilled, match up with no problem. The shelves are deep enough for all but my totally oversized books. I did find the instructions a bit vague, so I just looked at the diagrams and up it went with very little struggle. My biggest problem is not the product, but that my hands are relatively weak but I still managed with the enclosed tool. If you have a power screw driver, I suspect it would be good to use one if available. Would I buy this product again? Absolutely. Would I recommend it? Definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We have four of these bookshelves that we acquired over the years, and I think they are fantastic. Yes, it's not the greatest book shelf in the world. However, they are solid wood with no MDF or veneer, and they fold flat for moving or putting them into storage. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great shelving. Looks nice. Easy to put together. Only issue I had was shipping was USPS and I had issues with them. The company should choose UPS for shipping their product instead.
customer_reviews.author: Barb M

customer_reviews.title: It says folding but you still need to put it together
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I purchased several folding bookcases that came out of the box completely whole. All I had to do is unfold it. I purchased thing thinking it was the same. No such luck. Still had to put it together. It will fold if you need to move it after putting it together, but not before. Bookcase does look nice and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: this was not good...
customer_reviews.text: It was soooooo poorly wrapped and shipped that the edge was all busted up. I tried to contact Winsome wood and they wanted all kinds of proof that I bought it before their rude people would even talk to me... What I really wanted was just to have the busted (single) shelf sent to me as a replacement but they would not do this so I ended up sending the whole thing back for a refund. AMazon- you need to do a WAY better job wrapping this thing for shipping...
customer_reviews.author: Sheila McGinty

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Challenges but Nice Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase uses wooden dowels to help with the construction. Unfortunately, the holes in which they are designed to go are not drilled deep enough. I was able to trim the length of the dowels to get them to fit but it took some doing. Once assembled the bookcase looks nice and is sturdy enough to meet our needs. I would have given it four stars without the assembly issue.
customer_reviews.author: Griff OBrien

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and solid.  definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The wood was in perfect condition. No extra hardware was included but no parts were missing either. It included a little allen wrench tool to help assemble it and the instructions were easy to follow. I had no trouble lining up the pins and all the holes were well aligned. I was able to assemble myself without help but it would have been easier to have a second person to hold the pieces while screwing them together. Fully assembled, bookshelf is beautiful and is very solid and sturdy. Am considering ordering a second one because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Substantial. needs assembly.
customer_reviews.text: this is a very substantial piece of furniture . There is about 45 minutes of assembly time. It is all hardwood. Some pieces are jointed, not whole pieces . but very strong. But what do you expect for less than a hundred dollars. Once assembled. the bookcase can fold flat. I would buy it again. Note the hardware was missing in the original shipment. They sent it to me in about 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Blue ridge hiker

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartments.
customer_reviews.text: Great for apartments. I had 2 of these at my old apartment and added one(so far) at my new one. They do not require any instruction in the apartment itself and can easily be re-arranged. Unusually, the first ne shipped to me had internal damage, but Amazon readily replaced it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick assembly, sturdy, lovely shelving!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the comments of some other reviewers, I was worried that the shelves would be a nightmare to assemble. I felt compelled to review because these shelves were so easy to assemble and all of the parts fit beautifully into place. As a woman who has never assembled anything in her life, I put this shelf together in 20 minutes. It is a very sturdy shelf and lovely too! It is the quality that I would expect for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Able

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf, got it for the office. It did take some assembly (took me about 2 hours), but it was fairy straight forward. It had all the pieces and fit together very well. Once assembled, it’s fairy easy to carry by yourself (although it is still quite a large object), and it’s also very sturdy. I do like the light wood color as well, and it looks like good quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered four or five of these shelves now and plan on ordering another five or six. They are easy to assemble if the directions are followed. Solid wood, relatively blemish free. They hold a variety of items to include stereo equipment, VHS players, DVD players and books. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT assembled
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is very nice. But my grandson, Ryan , had to come and put it together. He is very good at LEGO so I thought he could do this easily. Took him about half an hour. He was happy to do it for his Gran. ❤️ I didn’t know it needed assembled. Either I missed it in the description or it didn’t say. I never would have bought it .
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Winsome, Lose Some: Collapsible whether you like it or not.
customer_reviews.text: While the shelves are attractive that does you no good as the screws strip their guide holes in the cheap wood. On assembly this leaning tower of deception is already racing toward destruction. Fast forward three weeks and four repairs involving larger screws to get a grip in the eroding shelf wood and the whole thing is one strong breeze away from turning into kindling. Setting aside the "foldable" claim, this book-shelf shaped pile of sawdust completely fails to achieve its mission. If you plan to actually put anything (let alone books) on a shelf, DO NOT BUY this one.
customer_reviews.author: Playonwards

customer_reviews.title: Once put together it is great.
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a fold-out bookcase, leading one to believe that was all that was necessary. Instead, it arrived with separate pieces and confusing directions. I had to have a nephew who used to build furniture come in and assemble it for me. Once put together it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and good storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: I live inna nursing home and needed a place to put my books. It also as storag/food pantry. I like that it folds up so when I am moved to a different room it's easy to bring with. It was NOT easy to assemble. The instructions are largely diagrams. And not clearly marked as to what goes where. I had help from the staff in the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Cilly Willy

customer_reviews.title: Great as an Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: I selected this shelving for my CD Player because of its size and matchup with the surrounding cabinets and furniture. It stands open-aired over an air-conditioning/heating vent and has easy access out the back to electrical outlets for electronic components. The easy assembly was a bit challenging for me, but that’s me. It looks fabulous and does the job that I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Warno deZelko

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these bookcase I purchased for my home office and I recommend them. It is not as easy to assemble as I wish - so you do need a second person to assist. But once it is assembled it is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: bells

customer_reviews.title: ... to do this (first time attempting to do something like this myself
customer_reviews.text: So it took a while for me to figure out how to do this (first time attempting to do something like this myself!). Needed an extra pair of hands to hold parts while I worked the screws in. Lovely, lovely wood..and love the natural color....lightens up my office. Depth of shelves is good, and I can fit everything I need on it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: amk

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: Product description and pictures matched product received. Assembly was pretty straight forward, took a bit of balancing of different parts at first. Easy to fold and move around as needed. Shelves are right height for small plants and for candles. Delivery was pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Vauthrin

customer_reviews.title: Should have come assembled. Nothing foldable about this out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is a pain to assemble and I pinched my fingers a couple of times in the hinges. A second person to hold it up was helpful. The shelfs have not bucked so far as the shelves are narrow. There is nothing foldable about this out of the box. Once assembled, it is foldable and an elegant solution. It should have come assembled to begin with. I am happy with it except for the initially assembly - especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grahak

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: This is going straight back. It weighs a ton. The pieces fell over while I was unpacking the box and terrified my poor dog. Way too much assembly is needed and there are dozens of tiny parts. Instructions are complete rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several shelf units and end tables from Winsome. This company always makes a high quality product. Easy to assemble; nice wood, simple design that blends in well with decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ferriera

customer_reviews.title: We'll see how they hold up when I move at ...
customer_reviews.text: We'll see how they hold up when I move at the end of my lease. But I didn't have nearly as hard a time putting this together as some of the other reviewers, but I also read all the reviews and was expecting to take my time lining everything up and bracing it as I went. Once it's together, it's decently attractive and holds all the books I can fit on it. Gonna order two more so I have matching shelves for once in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Canham

customer_reviews.title: Hardware cheap - shelves are filthy...
customer_reviews.text: Received this today - the only positive is that shipping cost 4 bucks and we received it in one day. The negative is that the shelves appeared real dirty, I mean that they look like the wood they used was from a poor grade of wood and 2 of the 3 shelves were cracked. The routered slots were chipped and it seems that they QA was sleeping on this order. The hardware is pitiful. The hex wrench is cheaply made and half the screws are stripped on the hex head markings. I had to dig up some philips screws to use. Will not buy from this company again. NEVER!
customer_reviews.author: Dealors

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, which is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the weight, but hey it's real wood, not laminated
customer_reviews.author: Ora Moose

customer_reviews.title: Good solid wood.  Some assembly is required but its not difficult.  Everything fits together smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these book shelves. I'm very, very pleased with them. They are a little taller than I anticipated but that's my fault since the dimensions are clear. Good solid wood. Some assembly is required but its not difficult. Everything fits together smoothly. The only small issue with them is that the bar across the back that holds the books on the shelf is very high. As a result, paperbacks and most other books will fall off the back if you aren't careful. Not a big issue for me but thought I'd mention it. More of an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: KJD

customer_reviews.title: Misclassified -- requires substantial assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This item appeared under "Folding Bookshelves No Assembly" search. But there they are, the pictographic instructions and box of screws, washers, nuts, dowels, as well as a recommendation that "extra hands" would be useful. I hope Amazon IT will consider how this item was placed in a "no assembly" search -- I've wasted hours and counting - unfortunately, ordered 2 of them, the lugging to UPS is yet to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ames

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble by 1 person ... Still have not put it together because need help and can't during Covid-19. Bummed. Good quality wood but too many things to put together and can't hold pieces without help.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelf
customer_reviews.text: Great little shelf. Glad I bought a collapsible one, will make moving super easy. Make sure you are a little handy or have help putting together. It is well built but assembly is not a snap. The earlier reviews are wrong in my opinion, I believe they have solved those issues, I didnt have any problems putting together. The finish is a nice semi gloss and smooth. It is sturdy and makes a great piece in my kitchen..
customer_reviews.author: Phillay

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was a royal pain in the arse to put together especially by yourself. It took me like 3 hours to put together and I was screaming and cussing the whole time. I will never buy anything to have to put together. NEVER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE THIS SHELVING!
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money. The screws can't go into the holes because the holes are smooth; therefore the entire unit cannot stand straight or hold anything (including its own shelves). You might as well put the box straight into the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: karen chase-levenson

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small/medium sized bookcase/shelves - can be assembled solo but two better - made with all solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Relatively Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal for $79. All parts were present including the Allen Wrench. No complaints at all. Assembled in under an hour; be sure to follow the directions especially the part about not tightening the screws fully until fully assembled to allow the placement of the shelves (absolutely mandatory.
customer_reviews.author: White Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Tough to put together, but easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I had a tremendous amount of difficulty putting this together, and this was because of the folding mechanisms. The accompanying Allen wrench was also shoddy and stripped quickly. Luckily, I had a replacement that I was able to use to get the job done. And when I was done, I was quite pleased with the results. As a fan of mission-style furniture, this is a really nice addition to my home office, and it seems to be quite sturdy. I'm not entirely sure I'd recommend it based on the difficulty I had putting it together, but if you're more interested in a nice, inexpensive, good looking bookcase, then this may be one for you.
customer_reviews.author: missed

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shelf for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent quality. It really is best to have two people to put this together though. Folding feature really does work. I'm not really sure what application would require you to fold up a shelving unit though. We actually used this as a piece on top of the Winsome Single Drawer Storage Cart. This shelf fits nicely on top and seems pretty stable without any extra mounting hardware. We have ours in the corner between a cabinet and the wall so it's supported on two sides and difficult to bump though. I'm sure best practice would be to have some sort of hardware to fasten the two together.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn’t read the product description very well but I thought this would be delivered fully assembled .. to my surprise , it has way more solid wood and sturdiness than expected .. the finished product looks very nice .. just what I wanted .. save yourself grief and have 2 people for assembly
customer_reviews.author: Sandlicious

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to provided directions.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. DO NOT OVERTIGHTEN SCREWS!! I had 3 strip on me!! If you have a metric socket set, use it. Throw the provided Allen wrench away!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R. DeArman

customer_reviews.title: Great little bookcase.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very expensive. It is very sturdy. You will definitely need two people to put it together. With two people it should take about 15 minutes. It's a great line of furniture, also bought the desk and the printer cart.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I’m a reasonably handy person and I gave up on this after an hour. There’s no reason this couldn’t be shipped mostly or partially assembled. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this shelf unit that I've bought, but the first I've had to put together (the first one a few years ago came assembled). A second pair of hands would have been nice, but I was able to get it done by myself within an hour, and with the help of a wooden mallet getting the second side piece attached. This is a nice unit, and I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy units
customer_reviews.text: Great shelve for the price. Made of solid wood. Sturdy, looks good and easy to store if you don’t need it at the moment. Much better than shelving I purchased at ikea 2 years ago. One cross brace had a crack. Rather than return for a replacement contacted customer service, they replaced damaged piece within the week .
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit. The price is great and it goes together really quick. I do use glue on the dowels just to add some strength.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Mastro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Durable Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase was easy to assemble. I did it by myself. It is great because you can fold it up to more it to another location making it portable. It holds many books and fits in a small space. Although I thought the price was high, it was worth every penny because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Good

customer_reviews.title: Love these shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of furniture. Great quality at a great price. My only small complaint is it took two people to assemble the shelves. Still a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy fold up self you can use anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Great sturdy fold up shelf you can use anywhere. Versatile, easy to manage or fold up and lay flat to slide under the bed. Perfect height and size for all needs. Shelves are not adjustable, but that is ok because they are the perfect height. Easy to move around. Looks nice and very strong. Great for people who have to move a lot because it folds flat. (I am saying good by cheap heavy bookcases that take assembly) This will last me forever.
customer_reviews.author: Career Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood shelf
customer_reviews.text: This little shelf was pretty easy to assemble with 2 people. Took about 1/2 hour. I didn't have to do any drilling to make the pieces fit as some reviewers had to do. It came together nicely, looks good, seems strong and sturdy (I use it as a bookcase). The color is truly natural, a blond/light brown wood (not greenish, fortunatley). I have taller, older shelves of this sort that are several years old, and this new shelf is about the same in quality. I felt I was taking a bit of a gamble after reading some reviewers say the quality of these shelves has gone downhill, so I'm glad this one turned out fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it to me
customer_reviews.text: I placed this on my wish list because time was short to review it. Without remembering that fact I ordered it and I am sorry I did. I marked it because I wondered if it was like my other bookshelf - unfold out of the box. Not only could I unfold it but it is extremely difficult to put together. It truly needs two people to put together. Some of the holes in the parts are not large enough for the screws included. If it were not difficult to return it I would. At this point I'll have to hire someone to get it done and I am truly not pleased. I would not recommend. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Crucian skies

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beauty and versatility
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It is beautiful and sturdy. It is easy to move. I bought one like it over 20 years go and it’s still going strong. New one seems just as good and matches. I like the open back because it can double as a plant shelf, letting light through.
customer_reviews.author: P&KT

customer_reviews.title: This bookcase looks great when it is put together
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase looks great when it is put together. Because it says foldable, I thought it was already assembled. Alas, it was not. I probably missed some fine print. It was a bit tricky to assemble. You need a hammer as well as wrench that is supplied. The wooden pegs you have to insert need to be hammered in to make the pieces fit flush. You also need more than one person. We assembled it in about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Freimuth

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking but a little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Had one of the back braces crack where the wood peg went in, probably should have sandpapered the peg smaller since it really doesn't do anything structurally. Another problem was the top. After I had it assembled I lifted it the wrong way and tore the top from where it was fastened to the piece that goes to the sides. There are 3 small screws that go into the top maybe 1/8". Fixed that with some 1 1/4" wood screws but it wasn't that easy to get the screws in the assembled shelf. Then one of the shelves cracked where the wood screw goes into the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well made shelf
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelving unit. It’s good looking. Seems to be very sturdy and well made. Easy to assemble. I bought it for extra storage for up at my off grid cabin. Serves its purpose well!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Fignar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious to assemble, but I did it because I am very stubborn. All in all a good buy and if you have patience, it’s very sturdy and nice wood.
customer_reviews.author: Dm

customer_reviews.title: If you want a strudy bookshelf don't get this one.
customer_reviews.text: This model (collapsible) is a bit of a pain to put together. The first one which I returned had split wood. the second one had holes that didn't quite match up, and too tight for the dowels. Also trying to insert the washers on the shelves requires a lot of patience. I just received the non-collapsible version-and it is great. Not only does it feel sturdier, it looks better and was easy peasy to set up
customer_reviews.author: MAJ L Haines

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: All good. this is nicely crafted piece of furniture. Well packaged and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it arrived VERY quickly! Very well packaged, in beautiful shape. The wood is very nice and with the relatively low cost, it does not look like a cheap item at all. Clear, easy instructions made putting this bookcase together a breeze, but it did take 2 people (I didn't want to ding up our freshly painted walls by leaning it against a wall). It is a really nice bookcase and as soon as we got the first one put together, I went and ordered a second one! I will probably purchase more from this manufacturer; this is a really nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Patrick Clark

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: I use these for books, with plants on top. I have been using them for years, because they fold up flat and then can be carried from house to house!
customer_reviews.author: j campbell

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and does not come assembled as stated on the site
customer_reviews.text: Did not come assembled as stated no assembly required and is damaged. Too complicated to put togeather.
customer_reviews.author: Viva

customer_reviews.title: Lovely solid wood folding bookcases
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bookshelf and really like it. It is high quality, solid wood, and looks lovely. I only gave four stars because one of the pieces from this shelf was split, but I have five other shelves (that I ordered about a year ago) that don't have problems. I am in the process of requesting a replacement part, but it looks like the manufacturer will send a replacement without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I like it... just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Only a single decorative side bar a little lose but otherwise perfect. I was able to add a few drops of wood glue to fix the issue with the one bar and it doesn't spin anymore. I think this is a sturdy little shelf.
customer_reviews.author: mersild

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this alone, even though it suggests two. It was difficult but what a beautiful piece of furniture it is. Real wood, heavy, very sturdy. Love it’s function as well as portability.
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixFire

customer_reviews.title: O.K. product - difficult to assemble, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely takes two very patient people to assemble. I had thought for the price, it would be very sturdy, but it does wobble, just like the $40 folding bookshelves do.
customer_reviews.author: Fish Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Largely put together for you. It’s very beautiful. Sorry for poor lighting on photo but it’s a nice color for sure
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shelves, strong and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all wood shelves. Just exactly what I wanted. I drove to Home Furniture, Target, several other stores, I could not find what I needed. The items at the local stores were not only the wrong design and size for me, but were also cheap, fragile, and made of "wood Products". Blahh! Thje winsome wood shelves just happened to be the exact size i needed, but they were solid hardwood, well designed and strong. So grateful that the Internet came thru, when local stores (here in Minneapolis) failed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kauper

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, excellent price. Not perfect, but its 100% worth it. Note, if you struggle to assemble things, it's not for you. I like putting stuff together, but not everyone is patient or careful enough. Keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Bob O'Pedic

customer_reviews.title: Review of 4-tier shelf
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 book shelves for my children going off to college. All 3 sets had a problem with the screws...they basically fell out so the shelves fell down...so as I quick fix I had to insert the screws and tape over the heads so they would not fall out...when I have time I will find matching longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. It was a bit hard to assemble but perfect for us. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas De Mann

customer_reviews.title: Good luck trying to put it together!
customer_reviews.text: You need to be very handy and have a bunch of tools including a soft hammer. I paid a handyman $40 to assemble it. It's rather nice when all done, but I can see no reason why this is not packaged and shipped pre-assembled. After all, if folds up nicely. The box would hardly be much larger than the one in which the unassembled case arrives on your doorstep. The instructions may make your head spin, but at least they are clear and accurate. The handyman took about an hour and a half, BTW.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Gregson

customer_reviews.title: Real wood shelving
customer_reviews.text: Very nice real heavy wood shelving is exactly what we received. Easy to put together and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: GMC Cocoa, FL

customer_reviews.title: Solid and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Although it took quite awhile to assemble on my own, it is a gorgeous piece of furniture. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, light weight, moveable shelving.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these over a year now, they have shown great durability! The folding storage capability makes these ideal for moving. High quality material and workmanship, of the 3 I ordered, I did have one part that needed replaced out of the box. the manufacturer immediately sent me the part no charge, So that turned out to be a good show of service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon378

customer_reviews.title: Sensibily priced, attractive, solid wood materials, and not difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is very good; the price is excellent; the product is attractive, made from solid wood, nor too difficult to assemble. After purchasing two, I liked the product enough to order a third. I also like that the bookcases are not so tall and the solid top shelf can be used for adding a decorative item.
customer_reviews.author: Summamum

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: One cross brace was split. Top has dark splotch. I have purchased many of these types of book cases over the years. Never have I had to assemble and never has the 'mantle top' been a two piece. The packaging (including styrofoam) was a nightmare, did I mention assembly? I won't buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: BKG

customer_reviews.title: a bit of a handful to put together alone
customer_reviews.text: once all together a good addition and came with straps to secure to wall.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hector

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf, love that it folds.
customer_reviews.text: It's got nice wood, and seems to be of good construction (after you, the consumer, construct it). It's not hard to put together, although the screws are a little tricky in that they are a tight fit and take some doing. The shelves are tall enough to handle my tall books (which I have a lot of.) It's doing what I wanted. Am happy it folds so that when I move, if I don't need a shelf for awhile, I can fold it and put it out of the way. Should make it easier to move, too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: A very nice quality bookcase. Pretty easy to assemble IF you read the instructions properly as there is a certain order in which the assembly has to take place. (I didn't). Very smooth, nice quality wood - pieces all joined together no problem once I figured out the proper way to assemble it. I am thinking about purchasing 2 more for a different room in my house. Only problem I had was that the plastic cover buttons that should fit over the screw holes to hide them were not the right size and would not stay in the hole provided, so I had to leave those off. It is not really that noticeable though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny F. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: An attractive, easy to assemble bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase required no assembly, the parts are hinged and it unfolds into an attractive, sturdy bookcase. A really nice product and great value!
customer_reviews.author: cwppros

customer_reviews.title: Foldable Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Whomsoever designed this shelf must have needed to move the unit around with the frequency of devout user of yoga mats. Assembly was a pain in the keister attempting to fasten the screws and align the stiles attached to hinges that definitely requires assembly by two people. The shelf unit is quite sturdy and attractive. It is the correct height for a wall containing diplomas or other framed art. The unit does fold relatively flat, presuming that is something one desires.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Leith

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf. It was easy to put together with the tools included and is just the look I was going for. I am a travel nurse, traveling light and relocating every 3-6 months. I wanted a bookcase that would would fold flat to minimize space, but also be good quality, functional and nice to look at. I would definitely purchase another when I settle permanently. Shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Strout

customer_reviews.title: It looks c
customer_reviews.text: Like the sturdiness of this piece. Look good in many areas do I n use in several rooms for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Grisham

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Mission Shelving, Natural
product_meta.description:
Style:ShelvingLet's face it, life doesn't stay the same--and that means that your furniture has to be able to go with the flow, too. Enter Winsome Wood's foldable four-tier shelf. Collapsible, portable, and versatile, it may live in the office this week, the kitchen next month, and the bedroom next year. The stylish Mission-inspired unit is made of solid/composite wood with a light natural finish and offers roomy shelves framed by slatted sides and an open back. All pieces are hinged, so it's easy to fold out in its current home, then fold back in for flat storage. Want even more flexibility? Add Winsome Wood's other foldable pieces from kitchen carts to desks to wine tables. It's like origami for your decor. This shelf measures 26 inches wide by 12 inches deep by 42inches high.

AMAZON.COM
Let's face it, life doesn't stay the same--and that means that your furniture has to be able to go with the flow, too. Enter Winsome Wood's foldable four-tier shelf. Collapsible, portable, and versatile, it may live in the office this week, the kitchen next month, and the bedroom next year. The stylish Mission-inspired unit is made of solid beechwood with a light natural finish and offers roomy shelves framed by slatted sides and an open back. All pieces are hinged, so it's easy to fold out in its current home, then fold back in for flat storage. Want even more flexibility? Add Winsome Wood's other foldable pieces from kitchen carts to desks to wine tables. It's like origami for your decor! This shelf measures 26 inches wide by 12 inches deep by 42inches high. --Kara Karll
feature_bullets: 4-tier foldable shelf is lightweight for easy moving and stores flat
Crafted of solid beechwood with natural finish
Mission-style slatted sides and open back offer light, airy look
Roomy shelves hold books, collectibles, kitchen items, and more
Measures 26-inch wide by 12-inch deep by 42inches high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars817 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
